name: ideaHub
description: Social Platform to Discuss and Manage Ideas
author: ideaHub

scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js & npm run watch:jade & npm run watch:robots-txt
scripts.jade: for f in $(find ./assets/views -name '*.jade'); do p=${f#./assets/views}; fpath=$npm_package_config_output_path$(dirname $p); $(npm bin)/jade -o $fpath $f; done;
